vsParam:
So... allow me to reintroduce myself.
My name is Verbena.

I currently hold the position of Lord Rod's secretary,
but I was the captain of the pirate ship Voltex.

Although my body has decayed and I've become a ghost...
I rushed here to repay your kindness to me.

Why do you say something like "I'll join the fight!"
every time you come to the Academy...?

Do you really need me to walk you through it!?
I think it's self-evident...

Hmm...
We actually don't know unless you'd be so kind to explain...

Gee. So... let me tell you
the reason why I'm determined to fight alongside you guys.
Because I have nothing better to do!!!

Bored. I feel so bored!
I really feel so bored!

Hmm... It's useless to keep saying you're bored to us.
Verbena, aren't you Rod's secretary?

Hmm...
Lord Rod is so competent.

He doesn't need any secretary to help him, because he can take care
of everything himself. To be honest, I'm not of much help to him...

He can take care of everything...
Ha-ha-ha, our Lord Rod is so good...

Exactly. He's just outstanding...
That's why I got too much free time and don't know what to do!

After I talked to Lord Rod... he asked me to stay with [px],
and said that I would encounter something interesting.

Hmm— He's right. You can go to many
different places and gain all sorts of experiences.

You'll encounter many things, but we can't guarantee all of
them are interesting. We may get attacked by monsters...

Alright. Don't worry.
I'm pretty confident in my capabilities.

Although I was the Captain, I preferred charging forward
over giving commands ♪

Ha-ha-ha... Indeed, you are known as a courageous
and valiant pirate, Verbena...

That's right!
So, I've decided to work with you guys!

Of course, you have no right to turn me down.
I'll prove my worth. So... hehehe, thank you very much ♪
